strapiPost.title: The Beach Boys Will Surf Through NWA This Fall
strapiPost.content:
The Beach Boys will bring their iconic California sound to Fayetteville this fall, making an appearance at Walton Arts Center for their America's Band Tour on Wednesday, Sep 27.

  • Surf's up: Lead-singer Mike Love wrote the lyrics to the Boys' first hit, Surfin', in 1961, and in the five decades since, the band has sold over 100m records worldwide, been inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, and received the lifetime achievement award at the Grammy Awards.
  • Wouldn't It Be Nice: Don't miss the opportunity to sing along with the iconic band that captured the spirit of American youth in the 1960s with unforgettable anthems like Surfin' USA, California Girls, Good Vibrations, and Kokomo.

Tickets go on sale this Friday, Jun 16, at 10a. Save the link HERE.
